ygData.subject: Re: Silvery Axe, spoiler request
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To be a little more specific, the silvery war axe comes from the hands of the honor guard, which spawns in the place of the normal elite guards. common
ygData.messageBody:
> SPOILER SPACE
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> So you want a silvery axe..heh NICE choice! Go to permafrost. It can be
> ripped from the Hands of Elite Guards in the Kings room. A party lvl 30 up
> average should be ok there..but WARNING..DO NOT USE AREA EFFECT SPELLS
> THERE. There are some ice giants near by who HATE bards...

To be a little more specific, the silvery war axe comes from the hands of
the honor guard, which spawns in the place of the normal elite guards.
common drop is the silvery war axe, rare drop is the silvery two handed
axe.
